title: Out of Office — Today
body:
Hi there,

I’m out of the office today and will reply when I’m back tomorrow. For anything urgent, please email support@example.com.

Best regards,
Your Name

title: Out of Office — Vacation
body:
Hello,

Thanks for your message. I’m on leave until Monday and will respond after I return. For immediate assistance, contact our team at team@example.com.

Thanks,
Your Name

title: Thanks for Reaching Out
body:
Hi,

Thanks for reaching out! I appreciate the details you shared. I’ll review and follow up with next steps shortly.

Best,
Your Name

title: Meeting Follow-up
body:
Hi,

Great speaking earlier. A quick recap:
• Goals discussed
• Decisions made
• Next steps and owners

I’ll share an update once the next step is complete.

Regards,
Your Name

title: Schedule a Call
body:
Hi,

Happy to connect. I’m available this week on Tue–Thu between 10:00–14:00. If those don’t work, please suggest a couple of times that do.

Cheers,
Your Name

title: Running Late
body:
Hi,

I’m running a few minutes behind and will join shortly. Thanks for your patience.

— Your Name

title: Reschedule Request
body:
Hi,

Something urgent came up on my end. Could we move our meeting to later today or tomorrow? Please share a couple of times that work for you.

Thanks,
Your Name

title: Handoff to Teammate
body:
Hi,

Looping in my teammate who’s best suited to help from here. They have full context and will follow up shortly.

Appreciate your time,
Your Name

title: Bug Report Acknowledgement
body:
Hi,

Thanks for the report. We’re able to reproduce the issue and are investigating. I’ll update you as soon as we have a fix or a workaround.

Best,
Your Name

title: Feature Request Received
body:
Hi,

Thanks for the suggestion—it’s super helpful. I’ve shared it with the team for review and we’ll keep you posted on any progress.

Regards,
Your Name
